mapper.insert: insert into register (name, email, company, store_name, store_address, store_type, owner_num, store_num, subscribe, paid_time, merchant_uid) values(#{name}, #{email}, #{company}, #{storeName}, #{storeAddress}, #{storeType}, #{ownerNum}, #{storeNum}, #{subscribe}, #{paidTime}, #{merchantUid})
insert into menu_item (store_id, tab_name, menu_name, menu_price) values(#{storeId}, #{tabName}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice})

insert into store (email, register_num, store_name, store_address, store_number, store_type, company) values(#{email}, #{registerNum}, #{storeName}, #{storeAddress}, #{storeNumber}, #{storeType}, #{company})
mapper.update: UPDATE store SET email = #{email}, store_name = #{storeName}, store_address = #{storeAddress}, store_number = #{storeNumber}, store_hours = #{storeHours}, store_type = #{storeType}, company = #{company}, logo_image = #{logoImage} WHERE store_id = #{storeId};
